body_html:
@vrv @damienmg Does repository_ctx.download throw an exception when a download fails? Because then we could write our own custom repository rule that has failover.

But to be honest, I would rather just mirror the files to a server that works everywhere in the world, including China. I think I figured out how to do this with Google's production environment in a way that complies with China's policies. So I'm going to be looking into that.

body:
@vrv @damienmg Does [repository_ctx.download](https://www.bazel.io/versions/master/docs/skylark/lib/repository_ctx.html#download) throw an exception when a download fails? Because then we could write our own custom repository rule that has failover.

But to be honest, I would rather just mirror the files to a server that works everywhere in the world, including China. I think I figured out how to do this with Google's production environment in a way that complies with China's policies. So I'm going to be looking into that.
